rows.label: qst201603_msg0001
rows.name: May I have a moment of your time, mo?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0002
rows.name: Mo-mo? Who is this?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0003
rows.name:
My name is Kupitapi, and I
am a music producer, mo.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0004
rows.name:
My name is hard to say, so
everyone calls me Teetapz, mo.
It is a pleasure to meet you, mo.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0005
rows.name: So... Teetapz, what do you want?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, Teetapz was moved by
that young lady's song, mo...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0007
rows.name: "Young lady"... you mean Nanakoori?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0008
rows.name:
Hoho! So your name is
Nanakoori, is it, mo?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0009
rows.name:
Nanakoori-san, Teetapz was
deeply moved by your song, mo!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0010
rows.name:
With your talent, you could
wrap all of Alst in a
blanket of emotion, mo!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0011
rows.name:
What do you say? Won't you take over
Alst with me through song, mo?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0013
rows.name:
Nanakoori-san, your song
has that much power, mo!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0014
rows.name:
...I... I can't. I'm not confident...
and it's embarrassing...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0015
rows.name: No, no, you sing so beautifully, mo.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0016
rows.name: You'll definitely be fine, mo!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0018
rows.name: ...Nanakoori, why don't you try it?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0019
rows.name: B-But...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0020
rows.name: You should try it!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0021
rows.name:
This might be a chance to
overcome your shyness.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0022
rows.name: That's... I do want to change...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0023
rows.name:
I want to become friends
with everyone and chat...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0024
rows.name:
And I want to do my best in battle
and be useful to everyone...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0025
rows.name: But if someone like me sings...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0026
rows.name:
It's fine, mo! Tora would listen
to Nanakoori's song forever, mo!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0027
rows.name: I'd like to hear it again too.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0028
rows.name:
...Mmm... If you all say so...
Maybe I'll try just a little...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0029
rows.name:
Yes, yes! Then let's start
preparing right away, mo!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0030
rows.name:
Teetapz's office is in Avaritia,
near the Harapekko Canteen, mo.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0031
rows.name:
I'll go back first and make
arrangements, so please come
see me when you're ready, mo.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0032
rows.name: Miss!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0033
rows.name:
You're going to sing
from now on, right?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0034
rows.name: Yes... as it turns out...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0035
rows.name: Then, take this Torigonda with you.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0036
rows.name: Huh...?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0037
rows.name:
You played it with such joy,
so I thought this little one
would be happier with you.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0038
rows.name: Are you sure...?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0039
rows.name:
I told you, right? My family makes
Torigondas, so we have plenty.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0040
rows.name:
When Da finished it, he said it
was his masterpiece, but he won't
notice if one goes missing.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0041
rows.name: Um... well...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0042
rows.name:
It's fine, it's fine. You'll need
an instrument anyway, right?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0043
rows.name: ...Alright. But I'll borrow it.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0044
rows.name: I promise I'll return it someday.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0045
rows.name: I'd be happy for you to have it...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0046
rows.name:
But, okay! If that's what
makes you feel better.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0047
rows.name: Yes... thank you...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0048
rows.name:
Let me hear your beautiful
song again sometime!
